already-account: Already have an account ? Sign In here !
error-username-len: Username must be less than 30 characters
forgotten-1: Don't worry, it happens to the best of us. We'll help you reset it in just a few easy steps.
forgotten-2: Please enter the email address associated with your account below. We'll send you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.
forgotten-3: Done ! Check your inbox for an email from us. If you don't see it within a few minutes, be sure to check your spam folder.
forgotten-4: In the email, you'll find instructions on how to reset your password. Click the link provided and follow the steps to create a new password.
forgotten-5: If you have any issues resetting your password or need additional assistance, please contact our support team at
greeting-auth: Join the community and enjoy all the stories and characters we created together
no-account-yet: Don't have have an account yet ? Sign Up here !
not-received: Did not receive the verification email ?
verify-text-1: To complete the registration process, we have sent a verification email to the email address you provided.
verify-text-2: Please check your inbox to confirm your email address and activate your account.
